entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:22 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 12:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 7.

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
